channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-16690] Move znode path configs to a separated class
item.description:
Which makes it easier to use curator at client in the future.

And also, will try to fix the bad practise that declares masterMaintZNode as static but update it in a non-static method.
item.summary: Move znode path configs to a separated class

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Yu Li stack FYI.
patch lgtm, let's see what HadoopQA says.

This message was automatically generated.

TestBlockEvictionFromClient and TestFlushWithThroughputController are known to be flaky.

TestRegionServerMetrics is passed locally. Seems the problem is that we have been blocked during shutdown. I think this is not related to this patch.

Yu Li stack Any other concerns? Thanks.
Ah I'm back. Ping Yu Li stack.
